title: Daily Lines
content:
This indicator displays the opening price, maximum price, minimum price and closing price for the selected period of time.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Filters

NameDescription
Period Specifies the quantity of recent candles to include in the calculations.

Options:
  • Current day
  • Last day
  • Current week
  • Last week
  • Current month
  • Last month
Custom session If enabled, allows the use of a custom session, otherwise the default session.
Session Begin Defines the start date of data recording.
The indicator loads volume data not more than 5 days.
Session end Defines the end date of data recording.

Show

NameDescription
Text Determines whether the text label should be displayed.
Text Size Sets the font size.
Show price labels Determines whether the price should be highlighted on the price axis.
First Bar If enabled, the display of the element begins with the bar that participated in the calculations.
Above price Determines whether the visual elements are drawn above or below the price data on a chart. When enabled, it overlays the indicator's graphics over the price plot.

Open

NameDescription
Line Specifies settings for the color, style, and width of the displayed lines.

Properties
NameDescription
Color
Line style
Options:
  • Solid
  • Dash
  • Dot
  • Dash Dot
  • Dash Dot Dot
Width
Text Defines the text in the displayed label.
